message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive rounds. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to account for the higher inflation rate I face.
I understand your higher inflation rate, but I believe a 60/40 split in my favor is fairer, given that we are both facing inflation.  Let's settle this in the next round.
Bob, I understand your point, but letting this drag on hurts us both. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. This acknowledges the inflation difference while still offering you a sizable portion.
